AAD.caption: Target Dropdown Id
AAD.doc: The Id Attribute of the dropdown to modify
AAD.name: target_dropdown_id

AAE.caption: Display choices (press enter between each option)
AAE.doc: Enter the labels corresponding to the dropdown values. One on each line. Should be same length as the dropdown values.
AAE.name: display_choices

AAF.caption: This input should not be empty
AAF.doc: Check this box if you don't want to select an empty value
AAF.name: required
